name: whatsapp
description: WhatsApp provider component supporting egress, ingress, and formatting.

secret_requirements.name: WHATSAPP_TOKEN
secret_requirements.description: Access token used for WhatsApp Graph API calls.

secret_requirements.name: WHATSAPP_PHONE_NUMBER_ID
secret_requirements.description: Phone number ID associated with the WhatsApp sender.

secret_requirements.name: WHATSAPP_VERIFY_TOKEN
secret_requirements.description: Verify token used for webhook validation (if configured).
